Name: Couple and Adult son
Title: Title!
Body: Just wanted to tell you we had a very nice time. Your home is looking very lovely. Thank you for the lovely welcome packageâ€¦ By the way the masseuse was very good. We had her come 3 days. She is very sweet and good at what she does.

Name: Phil
Body: When we first came upon this enchanted place we were stunned with it's beauty. From the moment we entered the doors the dream began. We will never forget the magic moments spent here.
